counter_speech: Hi, actually several experts of the Koran showed that violence is not accepted in itself, except for cases of self-defence. Those who commit crimes in the name of this religion, in short, are doing it violating the same rules of the faith to which they believe to be inspired.

hate_speech: Non possiamo convivere con una religione che fa saltare in aria i suoi credenti!
counter_speech: Salve, ritengo che sia per fondamentale differenziare tra chi commette violenze atroci in nome di una presunta fede religiosa e chi professa la propria fede in maniera pacifica e rispettosa della cultura altrui. Non  una questione di religione, ma di come viene interpretata da pochi, presunti uomini di fede.

hate_speech: We cannot live with a religion that blows up his believers!
counter_speech: Hi, I think it is important, however, to differentiate between those who commit atrocious violence in the name of an alleged religious faith and those who profess their faith in a peaceful manner and respect the culture of others. It is not a question of religion, but on how it is interpreted by a few alleged men of faith.

counter_speech: Salve, non ritengo che la religione musulmana sia di per s violenta, anzi.
